column1: full on off, and he slices a hard drive to wide mid off. Duminy gets his body behind the ball and somehow manages to intercept
good length on leg stump, and nudged to square leg for a jogging single
in the air! But just short of cover. Full outside off, and Dickwella drives with hard hands. The ball turns in his gloves, and he falls just in front of the fielder
angling into Dickwella's body, and he comfortably turns this around his hips to the leg side
good length on middle, and he flicks it off the back foot to the leg side
full on leg stump, and Perera offers the bat's full face to drive to mid on
full and slanting in on middle and leg from round the stumps, patted down the ground
full and attacking the stumps, forced back to Mulder
much fuller and outside off, Kusal drives it firmly to short cover off the front foot
good length on middle, Mulder draws an inside edge to midwicket region
he rides the bounce of this short one outside off and diffuses it to backward point
straying into the pads, picked off fine in the gap between the two men in the deep. Fifty up for SL
turned off the pads to deep square leg this time
back of a length on the hips, worked away to square leg, where Mulder, I think, fumbles and allows a single
just short of a good length and outside off, Kusal leans back and slaps it to point
wicket-to-wicket line, back of a length, hit back to Andile off the back foot
Kusal stays leg-side of this short ball outside off and spanks it to the covers
fuller and nipping away just a shade outside off, tight leave to round out the over
clipped off the hips to deep fine leg for one
driven off the pads to short midwicket. There's a misfield, a mix-up, no runs in the end
Kusal fetches a back of a length delivery from outside off and swats it mid-on, where Shamsi tumbles to his right to stop the ball
pitched up on off, driven straight of  mid-off for another single
backs away outside leg and rides out a single to deep third man

Mulder belts out an appeal for lbw. This might have pitched outside leg. Then swings in the air to have the batsman falling over the flick and ping the front pad. Yes, pitched outside leg. SA did well not to review it
floated full and outside off, Dickwella chases a drive and misses
pitched up on off stump, squeezed to mid-off off the front foot
good length on off stump, chopped to deep third man
full on middle, forward and pressed to point with an open face

Andile breaks the stand, has Kusal holing out to mid-on. Andile pulls his length back and shifts his line wider outside off. Kusal can't get on top of the ball as he aims a pull. He splices it to the right of mid-on, where Lungi runs around and makes this catch look simple
he rides the bounce of a short ball outside off and diffuses it to point
shuffles across off and works a length ball to short midwicket
full on middle, forward and drilled back to the left of the bowler
bouncer, angling in at the body from round the wicket, Dickwella is up to the challenge. He sways his upper body out of the way

Another rib-hunting short ball, 134ks, this floors Dickwella. He collapses and grimaces in pain. Man down. Dug into the middle of the pitch, angling in at the body, Dickwella ventures across off and defects the ball into the middle of his ribs as he aims to turn the ball to midwicket. Dickwella needs medical attention. And this results in a hold-up in play in Dambulla
length on off, nudged defensively to the leg side
slower cutter, 114ks, pushed outside leg, deflected to deep fine this time
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, Dickwella wants to force through the covers but an inside edge sneaks away to the leg side
pitched up on off, forward and driven back to Andile
Andile runs one past the outside edge. Good length, angling in towards off, tricks Mathews into playing for the angle but the ball seams away late past the bat. Little gem from Andile
Shot, Angelo! Crunched down the ground. Overpitched and outside off, drilled through the line past the left of Andile and right of mid-off
full and sprayed down leg, wide
slower ball outside off, stabbed away to the left of short cover
back of a length and angling into a leg-side flick past midwicket
on a length and pushed wide outside off, belted over the infield. Sweeper cover mops up in the deep
full and angling into a tight front-foot defence back down the pitch
pitched up and outside off, forward and driven straight to mid-off
back of a length on a fifth-stump line, a back-foot punch to mid-off ensues
Mathews hops, skips, and tucks this short ball to long leg for two
lifter on middle, 131ks, Mathews hunkers down
full on middle from round the stumps, Dickwella ventures outside leg and spanks it away to the right of mid-on. Bam!
good length on leg stump, Dickwella stretches forward and pushes to mid-on
Dickwella shuffles outside leg and the bowler chases him with a sharp bouncer. Fended off to midwicket
full and wide outside off, left alone
good length and holds its line outside off, can't make Mathews play again
full and outside off, eased down the ground off the front foot
back of a length and skidding in to catch the thigh pad
lobs a full-toss outside off, swatted down to long-on
another full-toss, on off, whipped off the front foot to deep midwicket
full and angling across off, front-foot defence back to the bowler
tossed outside off, Mathews leans into a drive and hits the ball to long-on
hint of turn and dip, sticks in the pitch, JP draws a leading edge but it does not carry to cover
starts on off, grips, and breaks away past the outside edge. Lovely ball to end the over
short and angling in at off, Mathews fends back to Rabada
on a length and outside off, driven on the up to short cover
back of a length and outside off, ignored
short on off, Mathews pats it down
back of a length and hits the splice, defended to the off side
full and outside off, Mathews carves a drive to mid-off. Maiden for Lungi
tossed up and drifting down leg, paddled away fine on the leg side. Amla chases hard and slides, but the ball wins the race
flighted on off and turns away, Dickwella inches forward and pokes it to the covers
lobbed outside leg, Dickwella misses the paddle
another sweep, this is hit flat and hard to deep square leg
tossed on middle, non-turner, whisked back to JP's right
dipping low full-toss on middle, played back
short and angling across off, Mathews goes deep in the crease and punches it down to long-on
back of a length and pushed through down the leg side, Mathews snicks it fine on the leg side for four. Help yourself, Angelo
full on middle, presses forward and knocks the ball into the vacant spaces at square leg
dragged short and fizzes away outside off, Dickwella uses the pace and bounce and late-cuts to third man fence

First fifty in what ages for Dickwella? Seam-up short ball outside off, Dickwella feathers it fine on the off side past the keeper and finds the third-man boundary. He blows kisses in the direction of the change room and celebrates the effort
short and outside off, forced to the covers
tossed on middle, forward and dabbed to the leg side with soft hands
overpitched on middle, and Dickwella goes for an expansive sweep. Struck straight to the diving short fine leg fielder
full outside leg stump, and Dickwella whips this behind square to short fine leg. Hundred for Sri Lanka as the fans go up in a roar
full on middle, and Mathews' attempted on drive is sliced to mid off instead. Played softly enough for them to run across to the other side
full on off, and down he goes on one knee to sweep behind square. Played to deep backward square leg
full outside off, and he shovels an on drive to midwicket. No run
full outside off, and Mathews drags a drive towards the on side again. Intercepted by Duminy
full outside off, but gripping and spinning away from Dickwella. He tried to make some extra room too, and therefore the ball's too far from him to cut. Into de Kock's gloves
length ball just outside off, and Dickwella carves a square cut off the back foot to the player in the deep
full on middle, and Mathews carefully sees this through onto his bat. Drives to midwicket
full just outside off, and comfortably pushed to cover for a quick single
full on off, and Dickwella walks across to the off side, and then drags the sweep behind square! Dive in the deep by the fielder, but that was well struck. Fifty partnership too

full just outside off, and Dickwella backs away to drill a drive to deep extra cover. They want the second, and it could be close if the throw is on the stumps. But alas, it's far away from Shamsi, and Dickwella scampers back before the danger got too much
full on off, and pushed off the front foot. Stopped by Duminy running to his right
full just outside off, and swept to fine leg
full just outside off, and driven to long on off the front foot
full just outside off, and he smothers the turn with a front-foot drive
full on off, and Dickwella shovels this over cover. Lands at a safe spot, and wide long off needs to race forward in a bid to stop them from taking two
full on off, and Mathews comes dancing down the wicket to slog. But the ball turns inwards slightly, and therefore takes the inside of Mathews' bat. Mistimed to the leg side
full just outside off, and he opens his bat's face to tap the delivery to point
good length outside off, and Mathews takes a step back before punching to mid off

full on leg, and he tries to play it fine past the keeper. Comes off his thigh, and de Kock does well to stretch to his left and stop the ball from sneaking through for a boundary. Appreciated by Phehlukwayo
soft appeal for caught behind but the umpire calls wide. Short on middle, and Dickwella attempts a wild pull behind square. The ball goes over his shoulders as Dickwella misses the shot completely
chipped over midwicket! Full on middle, and he simply whips it over the infield with ease. Played the shot slightly too early, and therefore went into the air. But overall, a rathers safe shot
good length outside off, and Dickwella's jab through the covers gets him a single
wide outside off, and Dickwella has enough time to execute a slap shot. But he can't find the gap, as Faf's diving effort at cover stops the ball
full on middle, and turned off his toes to square leg for an easy run
full outside off, and Mathews goes fishing outside the stumps. Taps the ball to cover, but there's no chance of a single on this occasion
full on middle, and Mathews brings his bat down to work the shot towards square leg. Calls early for the single, and off they go
full outside off, but Dickwella is comfortable in dragging the sweep from outside the stumps, and depositing it to the man at a square-ish fine leg
half-tracker on leg stump, and Mathews steers a grounded pull to deep midwicket
back of a length outside off, and Dickwella fails to execute his back-foot punch. Takes the bat's inside edge and ricochets onto his pads

played on! How often does Dickwella get out that way? Loose ball outside off, and Dickwella goes for the cut way too early. The ball hits the bottom of the bat, and drags this onto his off stump. Phehlulkwayo celebrates hard and Dickwella cuts a forlorn look as he makes his way back for 69
full on middle, and he uses his wrist to nudge a push to deep midwicket. Gets off the mark
length ball angling in, and Mathews swivels to pull to deep backward square. Mulder throws his body near the boundary, and his acrobatic effort stops the boundary
wide outside off, and Mathews punches towards the off side. But it goes straight to the fielder at cover
length ball outside off, and Mathews plays a dab down to third man for one
floater outside off, and driven to wide long off for a single
full outside off, and he brings out an expansive drive. Goes to cover on the bounce though
full on off, and pushed with the angled bat to the off side. Miller dives to his right to intercept
full on leg stump, and Shehan uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Tapped to the leg side
wide outside off, and cut off the back foot to the sweeper fielder in the deep
just past the outside edge! A slider outside off that's always angling away. Mathews tries to defend away from his body but the ball goes past his outside edge
flicked off his pads to the leg side for a walking single
angling into his body, and Mathews rides the bounce to pull to cow corner
good length outside off, and tapped to cover off the front foot
good length outside off, and Mathews offers his soft hands in a bid to steal the single. But his defensive shot goes to cover just a tad too quickly
good length outside off, and Mathews sticks his bat out, turns its face, and then runs this fine past the keeper for four. Third man was too wide in the deep. A deliberate shot, make no mistake
good length outside off, and punched to mid off to see the over out
full outside off, and he muscles a drive to the off side. But can't breach the infielders at cover
tossed up on off, and Shehan comes forward to defend. Played to the off side
good length outside off, and he shuffles backwards to try and cut square. Finds point though
good length outside off, and Shehan stays back for the late cut. Jabs at this, and manages to play this fine past first slip! He was itching for a release shot, and he finds a nifty boundary
a slider that comes into the batsman's body. He goes onto the back foot and works it tot he leg side
yorker on off, and Shehan manages to dig this back to the bowler
full on his pads, and Mathews flicks to midwicket for a quick single
good length outside off, and Shehan runs forward to disrupt the bowler's length. Meets this near his hip, and flicks it square to the leg side for one

full outside off, and his attempted straight drive is played way too early. Comes off the bat's toe end, but he manages to chip it just beyond Rabada's left hand. Beats mid off too, and the crowd goes loud as the ball reaches the boundary

is there an appeal for obstruction? Faf is asking. Soft signal is not out. Length ball on middle, and he works it towards square leg. Mathews takes off for the single, but he's sent back by Shehan. He falls while turning, and then dives back to reach the crease with Faf aiming at the stumps. But hold on, has he changed his running line a bit too much? That's what Faf is asking. Shades of that Jason Roy incident here. But the third umpire deems not out. Looks like Mathews didn't obstruct the fielder's view of the stumps
good length outside off, and fended off the back foot
attempted yorker on middle, and he has no trouble to clip it away to square leg
tossed on leg stump, nudged to square leg
full on leg stump, tickled straight to short fine leg
flat dart on leg stump, tickled to short fine once again
straight ball on middle, Mathews presses forward and clips to short midwicket
tossed up and spinning away outside off, stabbed to long-off
tossed on off, laced down to long-off off the front foot
picked off the hips between deep midwicket and long leg
full and straight, nurdled to deep square leg
back of a length and slanting in at off stump, Shehan hangs back and works to midwicket
back of a length on off, jabbed back to Mulder
dug in short and outside off, swatted wide of deep midwicket
worked to the left of short midwicket
tosses one up outside off and gets it to spin away, no shot
dangled up outside off, drops down to one knee and paddle-sweeps to fine leg
Shehan leans back and chops from outside off to backward point
dragged down outside off, Shehan looks to whack it through the covers. Nearly chops it on. The ball ultimately rolls past leg stump
stabbed down to long-off off the front foot
slower through the air, full and turns away, carved off the front foot to backward point
chest-high short ball on middle, Mathews sizes it up. Swivels beautifully on the back foot and pulls with great authority behind square on the leg side
back of a length on middle, Mathews jumps across off stump and clips it gently to short midwicket
back of a length and just a shade outside off, patted to the covers
bouncer outside off, Shehan thinks about the ramp but pulls out at the last moment and allows the ball to leap into the gloves of the keeper
very full and outside off, smeared to mid-off

back of a length and floated down the leg side, Shehan aims a flick. Was there a deflection behind? Not given out caught behind by Paul Reiffel. SA review the on-field not-out decision. They're pretty confident they have their man. Ultra Edge detects a spike, and Shehan has to go. He can't get enough bat and feathers it behind
good length and fizzes back in, strikes Mathews on the pad as he misjudges it
floated up on leg stump, glanced to square leg. Sloppy. SA concede overthrows
floated up on middle, Thisara stretches forward and smothers it
shooter. Does not bounce at all. Scoots through at ankle height to Qdk outside off
that's a jaffa from Shamsi. Looped up on off, the flight draws the batsman forward, the dip creates distance between bat and pitch, and the turn takes it past the outside edge
pushed through flatter and quicker outside off, quick turn, beaten on the outside edge once again
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, punched up to mid-off
fullish and outside off, punched off the front foot to mid-off
shortish and wider outside off, Mathews gets on top of it and sweetly punches to sweeper for his 36th ODI fifty
back of a length and outside off, punchily defended to the off side
Thisara looks to force it through the covers, ends up getting an inside edge behind square
short and wide, Mathews chops it hard into the ground, the ball rockets to sweeper
tossed outside off, driven down to long-on
tossed outside off and spins away, Thisara has a crack at it and skies it in front of long-on running in
fired on middle, jabbed away to short midwicket off the front foot
Mathews presses forward to defend this full non-turner to the leg side
worked off the pads to square leg
Mathews gets forward, slaps this from outside off to short midwicket
short on off, whipped out to deep midwicket
back of a length and pushed outside off, stabbed back to Andile
Mathews ventures down the track and secures a single to deep midwicket
short, wide, Thisara cuts loose and thumps a cut past the right of backward point. Dismissive from the batsman
short at the body, pulled to fine leg
good length on off, played back to Andile
tossed up, turns, takes the edge and rolls behind square on the off side
full and outside off, whipped across to deep midwicket
dropped short and outside off, leans back and flays the ball to sweeper cover
full and outside off, forward and drilled back to the right of Shamsi
picked off the pads to deep midwicket
on a length and spins away outside off, pushed off the front foot to point
Awful misfield at sweeper cover. Mulder runs across to his right, puts in an awkward slide, and lets the ball slip away to the fence. Short, wide, crashed away
banged in short and outside off, pulled firmly to deep midwicket off the back foot
back of a length and outside off, Thisara stays leg-side of the ball and creams it to the off-side sweeper
Mathews swivels back and pulls a short ball from outside off to deep square
full on the stumps, clipped through the leg side
short and outside off, punched to left of mid-off
tossed up wide outside off, and Mathews tries to clobber a drive over cover. Trickles away to cover
full on off, and turning into his pads. Worked away to square leg
full on leg stump, and driven to deep midwicket for a couple
full outside off, and he bends his knee to try and cut it square. Misses out
full on leg stum, and he clips it to short fine leg. Thisara wants the single, and he's halfway down the wicket before being asked to go back. Manages to dive back before the throw reached Shamsi
full on middle, and worked away to the leg side for a single
good length outside off, and he taps this to point off the front foot
full outside off, and slapped off the front foot to deep point
full on leg stump, and he misses a leg-side hoick. Hits his front leg, and the ball flies away towards point
good length outside off, and cut away to point. Wants the single, but straight to Shamsi at point
short on middle, and Perera goes for a pull. Top-edges this, and de Kock has all the time in the world to get under it. Soft dismissal
full outside off, and he slashes at this hard outside off. Takes a thick edge, and the ball runs away to the third-man boundary. SL go past 200 with eight overs to go
full just outside off, and he comes forward to defend. Plays his first ball towards cover
good length outside off, and he whips a punch to Miller at cover once more
spinning away from Akila, and he backs away to cut. Can't beat point though
wrong'un! Length ball outside of and spinning inwards. Akila shuffles to the leg side and pushes to cover
tossed up on off, and driven towards cover. Slices the shot though, and the ball goes in the air to long off
full outside off, and Mathews can't keep strike for the next over. Tries to drive down the ground, but Shamsi is alert to intercept
slower ball on middle, but Akila picks up that in a flash! Lifts it over the bowler's head, and off it goes, one bounce for four
back of a length outside off, and Dananjaya backs away to dab a cut down to third man
slower ball outside off, but Mathews has no trouble in flicking off his hips to deep midwicket
chipped in the air! But lands safe near square leg. Short ball cramped Akila for space, and he tapped this towards the leg side for one
yorker on off, but Mathews uses his wrists to flick to deep midwicket. They want two this time, and comfortably completed by the duo
slower ball outside off, and he turns this around the corner to deep backward square leg for a single. Keeps the strike, importantly
full outside off, and pushed back to Shamsi off the front foot
extra flight given outside off, and Mathews converts this onto a full toss, before whipping a drive to wide long on for one
full on middle, but turning into Akila's pads. Misses the defense, and the ball hits his front leg, but the ball would've definitely gone down the leg side
full outside off, and his attempted drive is sliced past the fielder at point
flatter ball on middle, and easily worked off his pads to the big gaps on the leg side for one
good length outside off, spinning away from Akila as he cuts this away to deep point. Shamsi finishes with 0 for 43

what a catch! Full outside off, and Akila's drive doesn't have the elevation. Hits it really well, but Miller - at cover - dives in the air, sticks his hands over his head, and takes a blinder. SL seven down
length ball angling down the leg side. Rabada appeals for the caught behind but Lakmal got no bat on that
full outside off, and driven straight down the ground. Not enough power behind it though, as the ball trickles away to the fielder at mid off
good length on middle, and Lakmal nudges this square to rotate the strike back to Mathews
back of a length outside off, and he taps this off his hips to the vacant midwicket region. They scamper across for one
short on off, and Lakmal does well to stand tall and muscle a pull over deep midwicket!
the extra ball goes for a wide too. Gotta rebowl. Length ball on middle that just angles down the leg side
short on middle, but Lakmal manages to defend in front of his face. The ball takes the inside edge and runs down to fine leg for a single

full on middle, and the ball jags inwards after pitching. Lakmal tries to slog towards the leg side, but he misses the shot and the umpire gives it out lbw. Lakmal reviews There's no bat involved, so what does ball tracking say? It says...not out! The ball would've missed leg stump. He must change his decision. Lakmal survives...
full on middle, and worked away to the leg side. Stopped by midwicket
full outside off, and the drive is stopped by Faf at cover. But Lakmal still manages to steal a single
slower ball outside off, and he muscles a pull to the deep midwicket region for a single

deceived! Knuckleball full on middle, and Lakmal does not pick it up at all. Tries to work this towards the leg side, but the ball arrives late, hits his front leg, and then ricochets onto middle stump. Good bye!
slower ball on off, and he somehow manages to push this towards the leg side. Mathews calls for the single, and off they go for one
good length outside off, and he sticks his bat out to deflect a shot to the leg side
full outside off, and he caresses a drive through the covers past the infield. Chase for the man there, but he does well to ensure the batsmen don't come back for a third
full on off, but defended off the front foot. Straight to Rabada
good length on middle, and he misses the shot towards the leg side. Hits his chest area
good length outside off, and he ramps this down to third man for a couple more
good length on middle, and flicked off his hips to the vacant midwicket region. Ends the over with a dot
good length outside off, and he mistimes a pull to short midwicket

good length on middle, but the ball hits his pad instead of bat. The ball goes to the leg side and off they go for a run. South Africa appeal for the lbw, but not given. Faf is reviewing. The ball definitely hit his knee roll, but goes as umpire's call on impact
full on middle, and worked away to cow corner
yorker on middle, and he whips a shovelled shot to the deep backward square boundary
full just outside off, and driven back to the bowler. Sticks his hand out and stops the ball from going past him

ridiculous shot! Jayasuriya goes really wide outside off stump, and the bowler followed him with a low full toss. But Jayasuriya swivels, goers down on one knee, and ramps it excellently over short fine leg to the boundary. Duminy did manage to stop the ball in the deep, but a misfield there ensures Sri Lanka end the 49th with a boundary
yorker on middle, and he digs this away to short fine leg. Not much you can do with a delivery like that
yorker wide outside off, but Mathews sticks his bat out and runs this down to third man near the boundary. Single available, but he says no. Hmm...
slower ball wide outside off. Mathews comes down the wicket to try and slog this over cover. But the ball comes off his bat's toe end and goes to cover for no run
short on middle, and Mathews pulls this along the ground to fine leg. Gets Jayasuriya back on strike
follows the batsman, and perhaps, hits him in the arm. No, came off the bat's handle. Jayasuriya backed away to the leg side and Rabada followed him with a short ball outside leg
slogged over the non-striker, but just a single as Markram cleans up at long on. Sri Lanka end on 244 for 8
good length on leg stump, and nudged off his pads to the leg side. Straight to square leg
full on off, and firmly driven off the front foot. Mathews - at cover - dives to his right, and stops a certain boundary
full on off, and driven beautifully through the gap! A gentle push through the covers and Lakmal's pace does the rest
good length on middle, and he cuts this square to the point boundary. Off the bat's outside edge, but de Kock was always in control of the shot. The misfield at point doesn't help either
back of a length on off, but comes inwards very sharply. Hits QdK on the glove, and he's in some pain!
full on leg stump, and that's been punched to the on side. Chase for Akila from mid on, and that allows them to come back for three
full on off and angling across the batsman's bat. Through to Dickwella
full on middle, and his attempted defensive shot takes the outside edge to third man
full on middle, but the angle into his pads allows Amla to get off the mark. Nudges it to backward square leg for a couple
good length on off, and he punches this straight back to Rajitha off the back foot
full on middle, and hits Amla's pads as he tries to play the on drive. A muted appeal, because Amla got bat first before the ball hit his front leg
good length outside off, and punched down the ground to mid off
good length on off, and he taps this off the point. Wants the single, but Amla doesn't want to take a risky run
full outside off, and he crunches a drive off the front foot. Straight to cover
good length outside off, and he mistimes a drive to cover once again
full outside off, and the square drive is beautifully executed past the fielder at cover point for two
full and angling across de Kock. He tries to drive, but the ball comes off the splice of the bat. Rolls away to cover point
full, and wide outside off stump. De Kock comes down the wicket and stretches his hands out to try and reach the ball, but all he can do is mistimed a drive to the fielder at cover
good length outside off, but angling into Amla. He rocks back and punches this off his pads to midwicket for a couple
full on middle, and Amla comes forward to drive straight down the ground. Pins the shot to mid on though
good length on off, and he tiptoes to punch down the ground. Intercepted by Rajitha
wide outside off, and Amla walks across to the off side before defending to cover
full on middle, and the whip to midwicket is dropped! Kusal Perera the man there. The ball went straight to him, but it popped out of his hand as he tried to snap at the ball. Oh dear.
crunched! Full on middle, and QdK gets his front leg out of the way, and drives straight past the bowler's outstretched right leg

How did that not roll into the stumps? That's what Lakmal's wondering as well as Amla defends off the front foot. Full on off, and Amla's shot took an inside edge onto his pads, before settling near his toes rather safely
good length outside off, but Amla walks across (exposing all three stumps) before whipping it square to deep backward square for a brace
sharp inswing! Length ball outside off, but the ball comes into Amla after pitching. He did shoulder his arms, but the ball could've easily taken the top of off stump
good length outside off, and he shoulders his arms once again. This delivery nips away after pitching infact
full outside off, and Amla shuffles across once again, and flicks it gloriously past the midwicket fielder. Top batting from Amla
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Mistimed to cover though
full on middle, and that's been clipped straight to Akila at midwicket, but he makes a mess of it! Rajitha was celebrating already, but alas

pushed wide outside off, and the drive finds its way past the cover for four! This is international cricket, and if you give a quality batsman a second life, he's bound to punish you. Rajitha learning the hard way...
full on leg stump, and that's been turned around the corner to deep midwicket for two more

full on middle, and the straight drive is dropped by Rajitha! It was a difficult chance, but he did stick his right hand out. The ball hits his palm and then goes over the umpire to mid off. QdK livin' dangerously
full toss outside off, and the soft drive goes between the legs of cover. Prabath the guilty man, so Rajitha doesn't react too much. But this cannot help the youngster's morale.
full on middle, and clipped off his toes to square leg
length ball outside off, and Amla throws his hands at it. Misses the square cut as the ball goes over his bat and into Dickwella's gloves
good length on off, and Amla has no trouble in pulling this away! Picks his front leg up, and whips this past the fielder at deep backward square
full on off, and flicked to midwicket off the front foot
good length on leg stump, and that's been nudged away to square leg off the back foot
good length on off, and defended with soft hands off the back foot
full outside off, and Amla uses his feet straightaway. Drives to mid off and continues for the single despite the fielder's quick release-throw
full on leg stump, and QdK comes forward to defend
full just on off, and driven off the front foot to short mid off
flatter on middle, and de Kock comes forward to defend. The ball turns away slightly, takes the outside edge, and goes to point
full on leg stump, and defended off the front foot once more. Finds Kusal Mendis at cover this time
full on middle, but QdK's done sitting back and defending. Comes dancing down the wicket, and lifts this attempted slog over the long-on boundary. First maximum of the day!
full outside off, but Perera starts off with the legcutter. The ball nips away after pitching, and forces a rare false shot from Amla
full on off, and Amla uses his wrists to whip this ball away to the sweeper fielder on the leg side for one
back of the hand delivery once again, but this is full and wide. De Kock throws his hands at it, and drives the ball straight to cover. Off the bat's toe end
full on middle, and QdK blocks off the front foot to cover
bunted over cover! Full on off, and QdK's drive is jammed into the ground, before bouncing over the infield for a boundary
good length outside off, and cut away to point on this occasion
full on leg stump, and the sweep is beautifully executed! Drags this across his pads and does enough to beat the fielder at short fine leg
full just outside off, and defended towards square leg for a quick single
full on middle, but blocked straight back to the bowler. Dananjaya's diving effort though, is not good enough, and that allows QdK to go across for one
full on middle, and defended towards the leg side. They jog across

full outside off, but spinning further away from the batsman. He cuts this square, and the ball goes through the legs of point once again! This is dreadful fielding. Can sense the frustration among the SL contingent. Lakmal to blame this time
full on off, and pushed to cover off the front foot
flat and pushed faster through the air on leg stump or even outside, Amla brings out the sweep and gets it pretty fine for four
tossed outside off, Amla eases forward and drives to the left of Prabath
arm ball, snakes in, hits the front pad as Amla plays all around it but this was heading down leg
slid through on off, pushed back to Prabath
Amla uses his feet and wears another arm ball on the pad, but this one is sliding down leg as well
dangled up wide outside off, Amla brings his delicious wrists into play and laces one to sweeper
short and spins away outside off, this legbreak is forced off the back foot to sweeper cover
De Kock makes some room and eases a tossed-up ball to long-off
full-toss on off, Amla belts it away to the left of mid-off, where Rajitha fumbles and lets the ball away to the fence
hard-spun offbreak, pitches on off and breaks down leg. Wide called
Amla uses his feet and pushes a slider back to Akila
short legtbreak, Amla, who feigned to step out, adjusts and jabs to the covers
Amla goes low, sweeps a full ball from middle stump to short fine leg
low full-toss outside off, neatly paddled to fine leg
fuller and outside off, Amla opens the face and drives to sweeper cover for one
pushed through on middle, de Kock eyes up a reverse sweep now, maybe he had gloved that wide of the keeper. Yes, gloved it
goes for a reverse sweep again, takes it from middle and hits it to backward point
good length and sliding across off, glanced to fine leg
tossed on a fourth-stump line, Amla stretches out and secures a single down to long-off
Amla dances out and drives through the line to sweeper cover for one
flighted on middle, de Kock ventures down the pitch and push-drives to long-off
Amla tickles a sweep from outside off to short fine leg. The fielder dives across to his right and gets a hand onto it. Tharanga it was
skidder outside off, chopped into the ground
pushed through on off, Amla unfurls another sweep, this is drilled flat and hard behind square

Sri Lanka have finally held onto a catch. Fine reflexes from Akila... or not. Amla races down the track, meets a full-toss, it was the attempted wrong'un from Akila, and stabs it back to Akila, who nearly lets the ball burst through. More relief than joy for him. Could this be the opening for SL?
full on leg stump, bunted to short midwicket off the front foot
reverse swept from the stumps, de Kock has placed it fine of short third man for his 16th ODI half-century
dangled up outside off, de Kock reverses again, swatted away to the right of sweeper cover this time
another sweep, this paddle goes down to fine leg
full and drifts in on middle, tickled through square leg for one
flatter and outside off, whipped away past the left of short midwicket
de Kock stretches out and drives a non-turner through cover point
pushed through on middle, played back to Akila
down the track, takes a full-toss, and clips to short midwicket does Markram
Markram steps out, meets the pitch of this offbreak and drives down to long-on
tossed up and breaks away outside off, draws the batsman forward, toe ended onto the ground, then to slip
de Kock uses his feet and squeezes a full offbreak to point
full and nibbles through the corridor, left alone
back of a length and angling into off stump, Markram presses forward, meets the pitch of the ball, and pushes to mid-off
much fuller and outside off, stabbed back to the bowler
full on the stumps, driven to mid-on
full and angling in to a little bunt to midwicket
overpitched on middle, de Kock leans into a drive and caresses it straight of mid-off. So easy on the eye. De Kock goes to the drinks break with a four
looped up on middle, Markram bends forward and dead-bats it to the off side

Akila dupes Markram with the variation: a sharp legbreak. Tosses it up outside off, Markram uses his feet early, and prods at it, playing for the offbreak. The ball breaks away, catches the outside edge and Kusal Perera snaps up the catch
full-toss on middle, tapped down to long-on
pushed through on leg stump, blocked from the crease
overpitched and outside off, de Kock backs away outside leg and slams it through the covers
drifting down the leg side from wide of the crease, paddled away fine of short fine leg for four
regal from Faf. On a length and outside off, driven on the up past the covers. Shanaka, the sub fielder, cleans up in the deep
back of a length and angling in at off, Faf camps back and plays back to the bowler
tickled off the pads to fine leg
full on middle, de Kock plays this one back to Thisara
bouncer on middle, of the slower variety, de Kock sways his upper body out of the way. Nearly bounced twice on its way to Kusal
short, wide, slapped away behind point
slower offbreak, grips, turns, prodded to the leg side off the front foot
pushed through on off stump, forward defensive from Faf
shorter and spins back in at off, punched back to the bowler
short on off, swatted off the back foot to deep midwicket
speared on middle, de Kock sweeps flat and hard to deep square leg
tossed on leg stump, and turns away, this legbreak is picked off the pitch and wafted to the covers
full on middle, and the check-drive goes straight to Tharanga at mid on
good length on off, and defended off the front foot back to Thisara
good length outside off, and Faf runs down the ground trying to block. Fended to the leg side
length ball on middle, and Faf has no trouble in whipping this square to the fielder in the deep
short on middle, and de Kock pulls out of this delivery. Attempts to pull but ducks under the ball at the last moment
good length outside leg stump, and it goes through to the keeper. Thisara appeals for caught behind, but the umpire sees through that trick
short on middle, and the pull has been connected so well! Races away to the backward square boundary as QdK moves on to 77
runs this fine to third man. Enough time to come back for the third even
full on off, and defended off the front foot to cover

appeal for lbw and caught behind! But the umpire says no to both. Full on middle, and the sweep hits his pad and then goes to the keeper. Was there glove off QdK? And was that lbw if it was pad first? Sri Lanka are reviewing, so let's find out. Looks like the ball hit his pad, and so the umpire says not out for the catch. But why isn't the umpire looking at the lbw? Looks like Mathews is protesting. And now the third umpire checks for the lbw: not out there too. All good.
;length ball on middle, and worked off his pads to the midwicket region
full on middle, and chipped over extra cover for an exquisive boundary! Just comes down the wicket and let's the timing off his bat do the rest. Lovely
full on middle, and pushed off the front foot to cover
full on middle, and he gores onto the front foot to defend
full on middle, and the defensive shot takes the inside edge. The ball trickles down to square leg for a walking single
full on leg stump, and Faf has no trouble in tapping this away to the leg side for a double
full outside off, and Faf goes down on one knee to slog sweep to the fielder in the deep
full on off, and the inside-out drive is spliced to backward point. They scramble across for one
good length on leg stump, and flicked to the sweeper fielder on the leg side by Faf
good length outside off, and the ball spins into his pads. He goes onto the back foot and nudges this square to Mathews
good length outside off, and spinning inwards once again. Carved to point off the back foot
good length outside off, and punched off the back foot to deep extra cover
full outside off, and the straight drive takes an inside edge. Rolls away to the midwicket region for a walking single
full on leg stump, and tapped to fielder at wide mid on
good length outside off, and the cut goes straight to backward point
full outside off, and QdK leans into a gentle cover drive to the player in the deep
full on middle, and defended back to the bowler
full on leg, and he uses his feet to whip this over cow corner! Gets to the pitch of the bal, and lets his batswing do the rest
full on off, and driven to mid off for a quick single
good length outside off, and cut away to deep point for a single.
good length outside off, and defended off the back foot
defended off the front foot
defended off the back foot to the off side
length outside off, and he backs away to cut off the back foot. Finds the fielder at deep point though
full on leg stump, and flicked away to fine leg
full on off, and Faf uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Works it off his toes to the leg side for a quick run
full just outside off, and defended to cover point off the front foot. De Kock wants the run, but Faf shouts no
good length on middle, and worked off his pads to the fielder at deep midwicket

full on leg stump, and that's been dispatched into the midwicket boundary. But oh dear, it's not off the bat's middle, and the delivery goes straight down the throat of Lakmal. Let the 'you-jinxed-it' comments come!
full on leg stump, and defended to mid on for a quick single. direct hit from Tharanga, but JPD was comfortably in
back of a length on off, and defended off the back foot. Back to the bowler
full on off, and tapped off the back foot to midwicket
full outside leg stump, and he swivels and nudges the ball around the corner for a single

full outside off, but spinning into Du Plessis very sharply. He misses the defense, and the ball hits his front leg. Huge appeal for lbw, but turned down. Akila wants to review, but <b>Sri Lanka are out of reviews!<b>
full just outside off, and defended off the front foot. Takes the bat's outside edge, though, and therefore the ball runs down to the vacant third-man region
full on middle stump, and Duminy blocks this away to the off side
appeal for lbw again! But not given. Full on middle, and Duminy misses the sweep. Hits his back leg, or maybe even his shoulder
full on leg stump, and the defensive shot is played off the back foot
chipped over long on! That's all it really was, to be honest. Length ball on middle, and Faf comes skipping down the wicket, before thumping this through the ball's line
good length outside off, but cuts inwards into Faf. Tries to defend but the ball comes off the shoulder of the bat
full outside off, and angling further away from Duminy. Tries to lift this over extra cover but can't get bat to ball
good length on middle stump, and JPD works this off his hips to the fielder at square leg
down the ground! Full on off, and du Plessis offers the bat's full face and drives this confidently past mid on's left
full just outside off, and this drive is even better! Caresses this off the bat's sweet spot, and past the three infielders on the off side. Classical
full toss on leg stump, and Duminy whips this off his hips to the fielder in the deep
good length on off, and spinning away from his body. Carved off the back foot to point
full outside leg stump, and he misses out on the sweep fine down the leg side. Well taken by the keeper
full on middle, and Duminy rocks back to defend towards mid on
full on middle, and he goes for an expansive slog sweep! Top-edges the shot, but Kusal Mendis - at midwicket - can't get under it in time
full on leg stump, and defended back to the bowler off the front foot
length ball outside off, but spinning away from Duminy. He sticks his bat out and cuts past point for one
Duminy forays down the track, Lakmal digs it into the middle of the pitch, and has the moving batsman stabbing the ball to covers
hip-high short ball on leg stump, JP hauls it away to fine leg
shortish and outside off, forced to the covers
back of a length on middle, defended off the back foot
full on the stumps, whipped past midwicket's right for three runs
JP fetches a short ball from outside off and hammers a pull to deep midwicket
flatter and turns in on off, Faf hangs back and keeps it out

Akila in his last over has Faf chipping a return catch. Legbreak again from Akila. The length is short and this spins away outside off, Faf goes back, closes the face a bit early and sends a leading edge back to the bowler. No fifty for the SA captain again. Faf's scores this tour: 49,1,48,7,71,47, and now 49
Akila belts out another appeal for lbw. Not given. SL don't have any reviews left. Pitches maybe just outside leg and spins away sharply to square up the batsman and the ball lodges in the back pad
glanced behind square, where Thisara fumbles this time. SL continue to be sloppy on the field
drifts in at leg stump, prodded to point
darted full and outside off, Miller drives a single down to long-off

Lakmal draws the outside edge, Kusal Mendis pouches it at slip. What're you doing, South Africa? Good length and shapes away outside off, Miller's front foot is nowhere near the pitch of the ball. He simply throws his bat at the ball and nicks it off to wide slip. That's the 100th ODI wicket for Lakmal
short at off, cramps the batsman for room, drags a pull to the right of mid-on
JP gets on top of a short ball outside off and punches out to sweeper cover. 200 up for SA
short on off, Mulder sits back and works a single to midwicket's right
back of a length on off, or just a shade outside off, tip and run to the covers
full and outside off, Mulder opens the face and runs it down to deep third man
full and angling into a front-foot defence back to the bowler
short and slides in on middle, punched back to Prabath off the back foot
arm ball outside off, chopped away to deep point
tossed on middle, scooped in the air to the left of diving short midwicket
short and spins away outside off, cracked off the back foot to sweeper cover
floated up outside off, JP drags a sweep to deep square leg for a couple of runs
good length and slanting in at off stump, Mulder gets forward and pats to mid-off
short on middle, clipped to the right of short midwicket
JP steps out, adjusts, and steers an offcutter to deep third man
back of a length and angling into a back-foot punch to the right of the bowler
full on middle, nudged to square leg
JP takes a short ball from outside off and middles a pull to deep midwicket
looped up outside off, Duminy races down the track and carts it over wide mid-on. Boom. Six
back of a length and drifts in, poked back to Prabath
sliding down the leg side, paddled to fine leg
full and drifts in on middle, solid defensive
tossed on middle, whisked away to short cover
short on middle, backs away and stabs the ball through the covers
back of a length on off, worked past midwicket's right
short on leg stump, hauled away to fine leg
Mulder rides the bounce of this slower bouncer and pulls behind square
chopped from the stumps to third man for one
full on off, played back to Thisara
short on off, jabbed back to Thisara
tossed outside off, JP slog sweeps to deep midwicket
full and outside off, forward and driven to short cover
down the track and smothered to the leg side
flighted on off, pushed back to Prabath
short and spins away outside off, chipped to short cover
big appeal for leg-before. But this arm ball that has struck the pad seems to be heading down leg with the sharp angle
short on middle, pulled to deep square leg
hip-high short ball outside off, slower ball, JP pulls it strongly to the square leg fence. Superbly placed
and now JP has drilled a catch straight to short extra cover. He steps out, this is full and outside off, hit into the lap of Mendis. SA 14 away from victory. 150th ODI wicket for Thisara
back of a length on off, defended to the covers
back of a length and outside off, pushed to the covers
back of a length and outside off, sliced to third man
short and breaks away outside off, cracked to deep backward point
back of a length, turns and bounces to catch the pad
down the track and jammed to the covers
sliding across off, sliced to backward point
back of a length on middle, reverse-swept fiercely behind point. The ball races away
tossed up, takes the pad and rolls away behind square
wide outside off, and cut way to deep point for one
full on middle, and defended to cover off the front foot
length ball on off, and blocked off the front foot once again
full on middle, and Phehlukwayo brings out another front-footed defense. Played to the leg side on this occasion
length ball on middle, and too close to his body for the square cut. Mistimed to point
length ball on off, but angling away from the batsman. He nudges it square on the leg side, but can't take the single
full on off, and turning into his pads. Worked away to the leg side
length ball on off, and he punches this with the spin to long on
full outside off, and straightening after pitching! Goes past the bat's outside edge as he looks to go for the big one
reverse swept! But straight to short third man
past the bat's outside edge again! Full outside off and turning away from the left-hander
full on middle stump, and he blocks this out towards cover
good length on middle, but angling down leg. Mulder simply flicks it along the ball's trajectory to fine leg
full on off but angling away from Phehlukwayo. Tries to drive over cover but misses out complelely
short on leg, and the pull goes to deep backward square leg for one
good length outside off, and flying over the bat's shoulder to the keeper
full outside off, and the square drive races away to the cover boundary! South Africa go 2-0 up
